name: Dreamcore Cosmo Bag
description:
Children repeat after their adults. Alien kids too.

The small alien creature named Kleo takes his Mom's make-up bag to try to be like her — socially acceptable in the patriarchal human world and less… chthonic. The cosmetic bag contains very strange and incomprehensible things, whose effects are more illogical than they look. 

Point and click make-up simulator inspired by kids flash games for girls.

Click on cosmetics and see what happens. The result may be completely unpredictable.
